text_content: Opened CalledIt and now I‚Äôm into meme markets üò≠  Didn‚Äôt expect to see Dog vs Cat and Climber vs Goat running as live prediction rounds. Hyperliquid $HYPE   failed to reach the 20-day EMA at $27.09 during the latest rebound, indicating weak buying interest at higher levels. On the upside, a move above the 20-day EMA would signal improving momentum and could allow the pair to recover toward $29.37 and the resistance zone near $35.50.
